activities: Operation of online wellness program that coaches participants on healthy eating and active living. Progress measured via private kiosk and on-site screenings.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Participant biometric and health questionnaire data. Biometric data not collected by the kiosk (e.g., on-site screening data) is manually entered into the system (via secure web form) and then processed automatically.
recoursemech: incentaHEALTH agrees to cooperate and comply with all EU DPAs and the Swiss FDPIC.
